oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cycloaddition of cyclohexa-2,4-dienones with nitroolefins: An unusual regioselectivity and expeditious entry into nitro-bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
SINGH, RB
TOSH, DK
MOBIN, SM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diels-alder reactions
masked o-benzoquinones
organic-synthesis
route
cycloaddition
diels-alder reaction
nitroalkene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cycloaddition of electron-deficient cyclohexa-2,4-dienones with nitroolefins leading to functionalized bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones with nitro groups is reported. A highly unusual regioselectivity was observed. Crystal structure of one of adducts has also been reported.
